tool_description: Access and retrieve properties for rent and sale in the UK by postcode, as well as sourced properties such as no chain or high rental yield.
name: UK Property Listings
title: UK Property Listings

api_list.name: For Sale - Reduced
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uk-property-listings.p.rapidapi.com/reduced-properties/SA106EF"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uk-property-listings.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://uk-property-listings.p.rapidapi.com/reduced-properties/{postcode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uk-property-listings.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
